groupdesc: You can configure here options connected with theme branding.

fields.name: branding_logo_type
fields.label: Theme logo type
fields.tooltip: Select the type of theme logo.

fields.name: branding_logo_image
fields.label: Theme logo image
fields.tooltip: Select the image for the theme logo.

fields.name: branding_logo_image_width_height
fields.label: Theme logo size
fields.tooltip: Specify the theme logo dimensions.

fields.name: branding_logo_top_margin
fields.label: Theme logo top margin
fields.tooltip: Specify top margin of the main logo in px.

fields.name: branding_logo_text_value
fields.label: Your own logo text
fields.tooltip: Specify text of the main logo.

fields.name: branding_logo_slogan_value
fields.label: Your own logo slogan
fields.tooltip: Specify text of the secondary logo.

fields.name: branding_favicon
fields.label: Page favicon
fields.tooltip: Select the favicon for your page (it must be a proper *.ICO file with size 16x16px.

fields.name: template_copyright_text
fields.label: Copyright text
fields.tooltip: Specify the content of the theme footer.
fields.default: Copyright Â© 2012 Your Company Name. All rights reserved.

fields.name: template_footer_logo
fields.label: Footer logo
fields.tooltip: Select the type of footer logo.

fields.name: template_footer_logo_image
fields.label: Footer logo image
fields.tooltip: Select the image for the theme logo.

fields.name: footer_logo_image_width_height
fields.label: Footer logo size
fields.tooltip: Specify the footer logo dimensions.

groupdesc: Configure options associated with back-end styling.

fields.name: branding_admin_page_template_name
fields.label: Theme name
fields.tooltip: Specify the theme name visible in admin page.

fields.name: branding_admin_page_slogan
fields.label: Slogan
fields.tooltip: Specify the text visible in admin page header after the theme name.

fields.name: branding_login_page_image
fields.label: Login Page Logo
fields.tooltip: Select a logo image for the login page.

fields.name: branding_login_page_image_width_height
fields.label: Login Page Logo Size (optional)
fields.tooltip: Specify dimensions for the login page logo.

fields.name: branding_admin_page_image
fields.label: Admin Panel Logo (16x16px).
fields.tooltip: Select a logo image for the admin panel (ideally 16x16 pixels).

fields.name: branding_admin_page_image_width_height
fields.label: Admin Panel Logo Size (optional)
fields.tooltip: Specify dimensions of the admin panel logo.

fields.name: show_documentation_link
fields.label: Display link to documentation
fields.tooltip: Enable the display link to documentation in admin panel.

fields.name: theme_documentation_link
fields.label: Link to theme documentation
fields.tooltip: Specify the link to theme documentation.

fields.name: show_theme_author_link
fields.label: Display link to theme author
fields.tooltip: Enable the display link to theme author in admin panel.

fields.name: theme_author_link
fields.label: Link to theme author page
fields.tooltip: Specify the link to theme author page.
